SELECT PROJ.PROJ_SEQ AS projSeq , PROJ.COMP_SEQ AS compSeq , COMP.COMP_NM AS compNm , PROJ.PROJ_NM AS projNm , PROJ.PROJ_SW_NM AS projSwNm , PROJ.PROJ_STD_YMD AS projStdYmd , PROJ.PROJ_END_YMD AS projEndYmd , PROJ.USE_YN AS useYn , DATE_FORMAT(PROJ.REG_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS regDt , REG_USER.USER_NM AS regNm , DATE_FORMAT(PROJ.UPDT_DT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updtDt , UPDT_USER.USER_NM AS updtNm FROM TB_PROJ PROJ INNER JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON PROJ.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER REG_USER ON PROJ.REG_SEQ = REG_USER.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER UPDT_USER ON PROJ.UPDT_SEQ = UPDT_USER.USER_SEQ WHERE PROJ.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND PROJ.COMP_SEQ = #{compSeq}
